articles.content: A corpse has been found in a junkyard in Haringey, north London, headless and handless, but otherwise preserved like a Siberian mammoth. It has spent years in a freezer in a cellar. Those archaeologi… [+4299 chars]

articles.author: Naomi Adedokun
articles.title: Meghan 'has been destroyed' after suffering same attacks as Diana, claims emotional caller - Daily Express
articles.description: AN LBC caller nearly broke down into tears as he warned that 'history has repeated itself' with the way Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex, has been treated, like Diana, Princess of Wales.
